publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5334 Mr Tom McCabe: Prostitution (Public Places) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Prostitution (Public Places) (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: George Lyon*
